title: World Intellectual Property Day – April 26, 2021
description: IP and SMEs: Taking your ideas to market

title: IP and Sports: World IP Day 2021 Celebration
description: The WIPO Japan Office holds an event on the relationship between sports, technology and intellectual property from a unique perspective of Japan ahead of the Tokyo Olympics and Paralympic Games in 2020.

title: World IP Day Luncheon
description: The Houston Intellectual Property Law Association organizes a lancheon to celebrate World IP Day 2019.

title: Conference on the New EU Trade Mark Reform and Its Impact on Germany
description: The patent information center Chemnitz, in collaboration with the German Patent and Trademark Office and patent information centers in Dresden and Leipzig, organizes a conference on the EU trademark reform and its effects for Germany.
